General.Name: Wangsu Science Tech
General.Description: Wangsu Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. operates as a cloud distribution and edge computing company worldwide. The company provides content delivery network (CDN), Internet data center, security, cloud computing, software development, etc., as well as equipment sales, such as network and computing equipment, and others. It serves medium and large customers, including Internet companies, governments, traditional companies, and telecom operators. Wangsu Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Ms. Li Ping  Zhou
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Non-Independent Director
